Html: I would like to host Wolfpack in IIS on a server maintained by my IT Department. Please let me know if this is possible and how to go about accomplishing this.

Hi - unfotunately Wolfpack is a windows service and cannot be installed in IIS.

It's a windows service to ensure that the core monitoring services run reliably - in the future it may be possible to run parts of the UI in IIS (via OWIN) but right now it's not possible.

Thanks,

James
